$comment: The core schema of the configuration file for the Expanded Gamerules Minecraft mod.
title: Top-level Configuration
description: The top-level configuration for the entire mod.

enabled.title: Global Mod Enable
enabled.description: A global flag indicating whether the entire mod is enabled or disabled.

rules.title: Gamerules Configuration
rules.description: An object containing the various configuration elements of the available gamerules.

^.*$.title: Gamerule Configuration
^.*$.description: An object configuring a specific gamerule.

enabled.title: Gamerule Enable
enabled.description: A flag indicating whether a specific gamerule is enabled.

forMode.title: Player-specific Configuration Mode
forMode.description: A flag which indicates how to handle the player-specific configurations list.

for.title: Player-specific Configurations
for.description: An array of player UUIDs indicating which players the gamerule should be configured for.
